title: Can Yuumi get the same screen-effects as her partner when they go invisible
body:
When Twitch, Eve, Teemo, ect. all enter stealth they get that tinted screen,
could you make Yuumi's screen gain the same tint/effects that her stealthed partner has

just to more overtly show that she too is invisible to enemies

replies.body:
This makes a lot of sense. I just implemented a version of it and we're going to test it out. Thanks for the suggestion!

{{champion:350}}

Please let us ping our passive cool down!! 
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
I just had an amazing game riding a fed Evelyn around and I would LOVE this so much, it's so hard to tell if you're visible or not!
Does Yuumi using q break her ally's stealth?
No - She remains invisible and her abilities are also hidden.
seems a lil unfair haven't seen it in one of my games yet but where's the counterplay?

No counterplay !!1!1 

Yuumi's q is pretty slow and easy to dodge, will just be a little bit harder to react to.
If I was playing Yuumi and got on a default skin Gnar and he transforms and my screen goes red instead of blue(I got the blue anger Gnar skin) I would be so irritated.
